SEARCH
Package com.sun.jna.platform.win32

Klasse Ddeml.CONVINFO

java.lang.Object
com.sun.jna.Structure
com.sun.jna.platform.win32.Ddeml.CONVINFO
Umschließende Schnittstelle:
Ddeml
@FieldOrder({"cb","hUser","hConvPartner","hszSvcPartner","hszServiceReq","hszTopic","hszItem","wFmt","wType","wStatus","wConvst","wLastError","hConvList","ConvCtxt","hwnd","hwndPartner"}) public static class Ddeml.CONVINFO extends Structure
Contains information about a Dynamic Data Exchange (DDE) conversation.
Siehe auch:
  • Ddeml.DdeQueryConvInfo(HCONV hConv, int idTransaction, CONVINFO pConvInfo)
